message: What sort of stuff do you guys put in the right side bar of your wordpress site?
It varies. You can check some of my sites to see examples: http://cdntoday.com http://raywaldo.com http://chiefshepherd.com http://salt.cdntoday.com & others <grin>.
If you don't have anything that makes sense, design wise, to go there, there's no reason to have the sidebar at all. Just a thought.
This should help you with sidebar editing: http://codex.wordpress.org/Customizing_Your_Sidebar
How do you add those stuff? I am relatively new with wordpress
